sn22.126:4.2: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha,
sn22.126:4.3: bowed, sat down to one side,
sn22.126:4.5: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘ignorance’.
sn22.126:4.7: And how is an ignorant person defined?”
sn22.126:5.1: “Mendicant, it’s when an uneducated ordinary person doesn’t truly understand form, which is liable to originate, as form which is liable to originate.
sn22.126:5.2: They don’t truly understand form, which is liable to vanish, as form which is liable to vanish.
sn22.126:5.3: They don’t truly understand form, which is liable to originate and vanish, as form which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.126:5.11: consciousness, which is liable to originate, as consciousness which is liable to originate.
sn22.126:5.12: They don’t truly understand consciousness, which is liable to vanish, as consciousness which is liable to vanish.
sn22.126:5.13: They don’t truly understand consciousness, which is liable to originate and vanish, as consciousness which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.126:5.15: And this is how an ignorant person is defined.”
sn22.126:6.1: When he said this, the mendicant said to the Buddha:
sn22.126:6.2: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘knowledge’.
sn22.126:6.4: And how is an knowledgeable person defined?”
sn22.126:7.1: “Mendicant, it’s when an educated noble disciple truly understands form, which is liable to originate, as form which is liable to originate.
sn22.126:7.2: They truly understand form, which is liable to vanish, as form which is liable to vanish.
sn22.126:7.3: They truly understand form, which is liable to originate and vanish, as form which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.126:7.11: consciousness, which is liable to originate, as consciousness which is liable to originate.
sn22.126:7.12: They truly understand consciousness, which is liable to vanish, as consciousness which is liable to vanish.
sn22.126:7.13: They truly understand consciousness, which is liable to originate and vanish, as consciousness which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.126:7.15: And this is how an knowledgeable person is defined.”
